posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content: WM 8 has no reason to be (ki damage is simply ridiculous), Monk 21 would grant +10% speed in addition to extra duration on empty body, an extra point of MR and a little bit more healing from wholeness of body (also an extra SF a day, but you are using kama). Monk has access to listen so spot can be changed for listen.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Spot is important for Sands of Fate, or I would have used Listen like I usually do. Everything else you said makes good sense to me.
